title: Franchise value of the New York Mets 2002 to 2019
yAxis: Franchise value in million U.S. dollars
summary: In general Franchise value in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, about 2100.0 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, of value 2000.0 was reported at Year 2017
